dependencies.dependency: TASK-033: Create Spring Boot Application Structure

task.description: Implement REST API endpoint for HTML-to-PDF generation. This endpoint allows testing the library via HTTP requests and serves as an API example. URL-to-PDF endpoint will be added in Version 2 (Phase 8).

acceptance-criteria.criterion: POST /api/pdf/from-html endpoint accepts HTML and generates PDF
Endpoint returns PDF file with correct Content-Type
Error handling returns appropriate HTTP status codes

task.note: POST /api/pdf/from-url endpoint moved to Version 2 (Phase 8, TASK-045)

implementation-notes.note: HtmlRequest DTO should include: - content (HTML string) - options (PdfOptions as JSON) - waitStrategy (optional)
Response headers: - Content-Type: application/pdf - Content-Disposition: attachment; filename="generated.pdf"

testing-requirements.requirement: Unit tests for controller with mocked PdfGenerator
Integration test with actual PDF generation
Test successful PDF generation returns 200 status
Manual test with curl or Postman
